name: Run, I guess? - Prototype
description:
"Run, I guess?" is a game about running in a surreal enviroment, made by four students of University of Kazimierz Wielki in Bydgoszcz.

Currently we uploaded an early working  prototype, showcasing the 1st level of the game. 

We want to hear your opinions about gameplay, visual aspects of the game and bugs! :) 

Controls for the game:

Move - WSAD

Jump - Space

R - Quick Restart

ESCAPE - Pause

Sounds by freesound.org and bensound.com
Model of the character by mixamo.com
